name: Kalevania
description:
Kalevania is a thrilling retro-style action platformer that takes inspiration from Finnish mythology and classic Japanese console games. Embark on an exciting adventure as the legendary Väinämöinen and journey through seven uniquely themed locations, each with its own set of challenges and enemies to overcome.


Choose your weapons wisely and fight your way through hordes of enemies using bare hands, sword, axe, bow, and 11 different runic weapons.



With over 50 enemy types and variations, along with many powers, upgrades, and collectibles to discover, there's no shortage of excitement to be found. Immerse yourself in the stunning world of Kalevania and enjoy the original score composed, recorded, and arranged by Ilari Hannula, and produced by Jukka Mattila and Ilari Hannula.

What sets Kalevania apart from other games is its dedication to delivering a full retro gaming experience. Are you ready to relive the thrill of classic console gaming?

5/04/23
Status update:
Hotfix 1.01
- Reworked the screen shake,
- Limited the amount of created particles.

There is now less lag/stutter caused by these features.

- Possibly fixed multiple music track playing simultaneously, (I have not had this issue so far).


Keep the feedback coming and I will do my best to fix any issues!
- I am fixing the other known / emerging launch issues as part of the larger patch 1.1, coming later this month.

Note: scaling to higher resolution screens can be very slow with html5 based games.
- On Windows 64bit platform, It is recommended to use the 720p or 900p launch options.
- On other platforms, if you have any slowdown issues, I recommend manually lowering the display resolution.
(I will do my best to arrange a similar resolution lowering launch options to other platforms as well for the 1.1 patch).
